description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a Minor Material Amendment in connection with the planning permission (DC/23/130227) dated 3 February 2023, for the variation of Condition(s), (2) Approved Plans, (8) Refuse & Recycling Facilities, (9) Cycle Parking Facilities, (15) Internal Refurbishment Works  and removal of condition (14) Air Source Heat Pumps ASHP in order to allow; replacement of the basement, ground floor, first floor and second floor layout plans and reference to revised plans in conditions 2, 8, 9; Rewording of Condition 15 to take account of the revised basement and ground floor layout plans;Replacement of drawings references; The refuse and recycling facilities shall be provided prior to occupation of the development and shall thereafter be permanently retained and maintained; Condition 9 - The cycle parking facilities shall be provided in full accordance with approved drawing CMT045.101.X and made available for use prior to occupation of the development and maintained thereafter;  The internal works to the ground and first floor will be completed in full prior to the first occupation of the last residential unit;M&E design does not propose ASHP at Montague Arms, 289 Queens Road SE15.
site_name: MONTAGUE ARMS, 289 QUEENS ROAD, LONDON, SE15 2PA
